title: D4 ADC LF serious team for improving
body:
Hi,

I'm an ADC main looking for a serious team to join, preferably around Diamond. I feel like being in a Ranked 5's environment will allow me to further improve as opposed to Solo Queue, where I'm starting to find all sorts of toxic players.

As a player I generally excel at mechanical play, although my game knowledge is a bit lackluster. My best champs right now are  {{champion:22}}, {{champion:15}}, {{champion:67}}, {{champion:236}} and {{champion:42}} in no particular order, although I can play most other AD carries to a Diamond level. I'm also working on my {{champion:429}}  as she's a very strong pick at the moment.

If you're interested in picking me up or trying me out, don't hesitate to add me in-game.

Thanks.
